name: Fate chapter 2: The Beginning
storyline: You're a male named Mike Gillbour, and you've recently started your own business as an investigative journalist, and you've been given an assignment to look around the small town of Darkwood. You accept the assignment, of course, and head straight to the first clue, the "hotel", which apparently belongs to a murderer, and you want to get to the bottom of it. But in the end, it ends the way no one would have suspected. The whole thing takes a huge turn and then the tide turns. Mysterious things happen, paranormal things happen and a strange story awaits you in Fate Chapter 2: The Beginning.
summary: Fate chapter 2 is a psychological horror game with a playtime of about 5-6 hours. It includes many puzzles and gnarly scenes and is a single player game. In this game there is blood sexual content and strong language. There are many scenes of blood, dismembered people and much more.
